inclusion.criterion: first diagnosed corresponding to the diagnostic standards established by Asthma Committee, Respiratory Society, Chinese Medical Association, or previously diagnosed asthma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mch bronchial provocation test is positive
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: accompanied by other disease of respiratory system
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: combined with serious illness of other system, such as myocardial infarction, severe arrhythmia, malignant tumors and so on
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma for 3 years. Spirometry revealed FEV1 of 63% predicted.
